posts.post_content:
FS:  Eddie Collins P350 - $old

Graded SGC 10 - broken case

Shipped - paypal gift

If there is anything in life that I have learned it is that one should never prop up uneven furniture with graded cards.  Stacks of raw cards work much better.

And good luck with the sale.  Slab crackers should rejoice with the head start they have been given.

Brian
